skillID: the ID of a givin skill
is elite: if this skill is 'elite' or not at this level
RequiresLastLevel: if this skill requires the last level or not
condition:
if this can be applied to a givin ship
linked object:
Object[] Lord, PersionAPI, ShipCompositionData
Lord is the lord this officer belongs to.
PersionAPI is the person getting the skill (lord, officer, or otherwize)
ShipCompositionData is the data attached to the relevent ship this person is piliting
type:
Lord: skill appyed to lords
Officer: skills applyed to officers
ALL: skills applyed to everyone
Notes:
why does this even need to exsist?
because normal officers are very suboptimal on random lord fleets. And I want them to at least be a bit scary

also just giving lords more skills is not good difacalty balance?
